channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: My Fair Pancake. When the Emperor Penguin visits the berg, he discovers Pancake is a long-lost prince. Pancake learns how to act royal, but all the attention goes to his head.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dodge's Pup School
channel.desc: Don't Touch! Miss Collie tells the pups they cannot play on the new climbing frame as the paint is wet. The temptation becomes too much, and Dodge is accidentally knocked into the wet paint.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle's After School Club
channel.desc: Waffle the Cheerleader. Mrs Hobbs's tidy up activity turns into cheerleading chaos when Waffle runs off with a pompom. Once the hall is clean, Evie leads a cheerleading finale.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Who's Been Sleeping in My Den? A mysterious visitor has been sleeping in everyone's dens. Detective Oona is on the case.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Find Street Art. JoJo and Gran Gran set off on a street art trail with a big surprise at the end of it.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: Little Nana and the Tub! Little Nana and Lambkin play with the great big tub, until it rolls away with Little Nana inside. Hurry, Lambkin! Catch the great big tub.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Chatter Boxes. Animation about a family of small creatures who live on, and inside, a planet. Major invents a system so he can hear the other Clangers when they call him for soup.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Following. The Tombliboos are playing, but Tombliboo Eee cannot decide what to do as she doesn't want to play the drums like Tombliboo Unn or play with bricks like Tombliboo Ooo.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Carlos Gu - Got to Dance. Strictly Come Dancing's Carlos Gu tells the inspiring tale of Magnus the monkey, who simply loves to dance.
